name: papoo/ccm19integration6
description: This plugin integrates the CCM19 Cookie Consent Manager.

description.de-DE:
Dieses Plugin integriert den CCM19 Cookie Consent Manager.

Melden Sie sich beim CCM19 an und kopieren Sie ihr Code-Snippet in die Konfiguration dieses Plugins, um es zu aktivieren.
description.en-GB:
This plugin integrates the CCM19 Cookie Consent Manager.

Login to CCM19 and copy the code snippet into the configuration of this plugin to activate it.

suggest.shopware/administration: Require '*'. Allows you to to set up the plugin easily
